Verses: 1 menmaipaaraattugiradhu Enakkuth Thagudhiyallave; Aagilum, Karththar Aruliya Dharisanangalaiyum Velippaduththalgalaiyum Sollugiren.

2 kiristhuvukkullaana Oru Manushanai Ariven; Avan Padhinaalu Varushaththirku Munne Moondraam Vaanamvaraikkum Edukkappattaan; Avan Sareeraththilirundhaano, Sareeraththirkup Purambeyirundhaano, Adhai Ariyen; Dhevan Arivaar.
3 andha Manushan Paradheesukkul Edukkappattu, Manushar Pesappadaadhadhum Vaakkukkettaadhadhumaagiya Vaarththaigalaik Kettaanendru Arindhirukkiren.
4 avan Sareeraththilirundhaano, Sareeraththirkup Purambeyirundhaano, Adhai Ariyen; Dhevan Arivaar.
5 ippadippattavanaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattuven; Aanaalum Ennaikkuriththu En Balaveenangalileyandri, Verondrilum Menmaipaaraattamaatten.

6 saththiyamaanadhai Naan Pesugiren; Naan Menmaipaaraatta Manadhaayirundhaalum, Naan Buththiyeenanalla, Aanaalum Oruvanum Ennidaththil Kaangiradharkum, Ennaale Ketkiradharkum Melaaga Ennai Ennaadhapadikku Appadi Seyyaadhiruppen.

7 andriyum, Enakku Velippaduththappattavaigalukkuriya Menmaiyinimiththam Naan Ennai Uyarththaadhapadikku, En Maamsaththile Oru Mul Kodukkappattirukkiradhu; Ennai Naan Uyarththaadhapadikku, Adhu Ennaik Kuttum Saaththaanudaiya Thoodhanaayirukkiradhu
8 adhu Ennaivittu Neengumpadikku Naan Moondrudharam Karththaridaththilvendikkonden.

9 adharku Avar: En Kirubai Unakkuppodhum; Balaveenaththile En Balam Pooranamaai Vilangum Endraar. Aagaiyaal, Kiristhuvin Vallamai Enmel Thangumpadi, En Balaveenangalaikkuriththu Naan Migavum Santhoshamaai Menmaipaaraattuven

10 andhappadi Naan Balaveenanaayirukkumpodhe Balamullavanaayirukkiren; Aagaiyaal Kiristhuvinimiththam Enakkuvarum Balaveenangalilum, Nindhaigalilum, Nerukkangalilum, Thunbangalilum, Idukkangalilum Naan Piriyappadugiren.

11 menmaipaaraatti, Buththiyeenanaayinen; Neengale Idharku Ennaip Balavandhappaduththineergal. Naan Ondrumillaiyendraalum, Magaa Piradhaana Apposthalarukkum Naan Evvalavum Kuraindhavanaayiraadhapadiyaal, Ungalaale Mechchikkollappadavendiyadhaayirundhadhe.
12 apposthalanukkuriya Adaiyaalangal Ellaavidhamaana Porumaiyodum, Adhisayangalodum, Arpudhangalodum, Vallamaigalodum, Ungalukkulle Nadappikkappattadhe.
13 edhile Matra Sabaigalukkuk Kuraivaayirundheergal? Naan Ungalai Varuththappaduththaadhirundhadhe Ungalukkuk Kuraivu; Indha Aniyaayaththai Enakku Manniyungal.

14 idho, Ungalidaththirku Moondraandharam Vara Aayaththamaayirukkiren; Naan Ungalai Varuththappaduththuvadhillai; Naan Ungaludaiyadhaiyalla, Ungalaiye Thedugiren: Petraarukkup Pillaigalalla, Pillaigalukkup Petraargale Pokkishangalai Serththuvaikkavendum.

15 aadhalaal, Naan Ungalil Evvalavu Adhigamaai Anbukoorugireno Avvalavu Kuraivaai Ungalaal Anbukoorappattirundhaalum, Migavum Santhoshamaai Naan Ungal Aaththumaakkalukkaaga Selavupannavum Selavupannappadavum Virumbugiren
16 appadiyaagattum; Naan Ungalukkup Paaramaayirukkavillai; Aanaalum, Ubaayamullavanaayirundhu, Thandhiraththinaale Ungalaip Pidiththenaam.
17 naan Ungalidaththirku Anuppinavargalil Evanmoolamaayaavadhu Ungalidaththil Pozhivaith Thedinadhundaa?

18 theeththu Ungalidaththil Varumpadi Naan Avanaik Kettukkondu, Avanudanekooda Oru Sagodharanai Anuppinen; Theeththu Ungalidaththil Edhaavadhu Pozhivaith Thedinaanaa? Naangal Ore Aaviyaiyudaiyavargalaai, Ore Adichchuvadugalil Nadandhomallavaa?

19 naangal Yokkiyargalendru Vilangumpadi Ungalidaththil Pesugiromendru Ennugireergalo? Dhevanukkumunbaagak Kiristhuvukkul Pesugirom. Piriyamaanavargale, Sagalaththaiyum Ungal Bakthiviruththikkaaga Seygirom.

20 aagilum Naan Vandhu Ungalai En Manadhinpadiyirukkiravargalaagak Kaanaamalum, Naanum Ungal Manadhinpadiyirukkiravanaagak Kaanappadaamalumiruppenovendrum; Virodhangal, Vairaakkiyangal, Kobangal Vaakkuvaadhangal, Purankoorudhal, Kotsolludhal, Irumaappu, Kalakangal Aagiya Ivaigal Ungalukkulle Undaayirukkumovendrum;

21 marupadiyum Naan Varugirapodhu En Dhevan Ungalidaththil Ennaith Thaazhththumpadikku Mun Paavanjeydhavargalaagiya Anegar Thaangal Nadappiththa Asuththaththaiyum Vesiththanaththaiyum Kaamavigaaraththaiyum Vittu Mananthirumbaamalirukkiradhaikkuriththu, Naan Thukkappadavendiyadhaayirukkumovendrum Bayandhirukkiren.
